title: I dont have my 10yr anniversary icon yet.
body: Its already 9/18 and I still haven't gotten mine yet ;-;

replies.body:
We're sending these out to **a ton of players.** Because of this, we've had to send them out in waves so they get out properly. 

Let me know if you don't have it by the 23rd of this month.
Its 27th today and i didnt receive my icon . I played thousands of game this summer . . . So i would like a reasonable answer pls

We've extended the deadline for these gifts to the 30th, as we're still getting them out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
same, i got the skin but no icon i would rather just have the icon then the skin even
I got the skin with no icon... i rather have the icon too lol
same here i have my skin but no icon :////
